NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
Change to your NCS log in details
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Due to a system update, user names and passwords for NCS accounts on our booking website have been reset and your previous details may not work.
If you have any difficulty logging in to your account, please use the 'Forgotten log in details?' button to receive your new username and password by email.
We apologise for any inconvenience this causes.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
